entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:20 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
